thread.title: Watch John Mayer And Dave Chappelle Cover Nirvana In LA
thread.title_full: Watch John Mayer And Dave Chappelle Cover Nirvana In LA

author: Peter Helman
title: Watch John Mayer And Dave Chappelle Cover Nirvana In LA
text:
10:17   Instagram.com/jameshwelsh 
John Mayer has appeared on Chappelle’s Show before, and on Tuesday night, Dave Chappelle returned the favor, showing up at Mayer’s secret acoustic show in LA to sing a few songs. Chappelle’s love for Nirvana is well-documented , and he proved it again at the concert, assisting Mayer on a cover of Nirvana’s “Come As You Are.” Watch below via LiveForLiveMusic . A video posted by Jan M (@nightengale68) on Jan 4, 2017 at 3:13am PST 
They also did “Free Fallin'”: A video posted by Kenzie Doyle (@kenzdoyle) on Jan 4, 2017 at 8:37am PST 
Dave Chappelle’s singing isn’t great, but it’s still probably better than John Mayer’s standup career .
